trans-unit.source: View and manage StorSimple alerts | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: View and manage StorSimple alerts | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes StorSimple alert conditions and severity, how to configure alert notifications, and how to use the StorSimple Manager service to manage alerts.
trans-unit.target: Describes StorSimple alert conditions and severity, how to configure alert notifications, and how to use the StorSimple Manager service to manage alerts.

trans-unit.source: Use the StorSimple Manager service to view and manage StorSimple alerts
trans-unit.target: Use the StorSimple Manager service to view and manage StorSimple alerts

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The **Alerts** tab in the StorSimple Manager service provides a way for you to review and clear StorSimple device–related alerts on a real-time basis.
trans-unit.target: The **Alerts** tab in the StorSimple Manager service provides a way for you to review and clear StorSimple device–related alerts on a real-time basis.

trans-unit.source: From this tab, you can centrally monitor the health of your StorSimple devices and the overall Microsoft Azure StorSimple solution.
trans-unit.target: From this tab, you can centrally monitor the health of your StorSimple devices and the overall Microsoft Azure StorSimple solution.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes common alert conditions, alert severity levels, and how to configure alert notifications.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial describes common alert conditions, alert severity levels, and how to configure alert notifications.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it includes alert quick reference tables, which enable you to quickly locate a specific alert and respond appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, it includes alert quick reference tables, which enable you to quickly locate a specific alert and respond appropriately.

trans-unit.source: Alerts page
trans-unit.target: Alerts page

trans-unit.source: Common alert conditions
trans-unit.target: Common alert conditions

trans-unit.source: Your StorSimple device generates alerts in response to a variety of conditions.
trans-unit.target: Your StorSimple device generates alerts in response to a variety of conditions.

trans-unit.source: The following are the most common types of alert conditions:
trans-unit.target: The following are the most common types of alert conditions:

trans-unit.source: **Hardware issues** – These alerts tell you about the health of your hardware.
trans-unit.target: **Hardware issues** – These alerts tell you about the health of your hardware.

trans-unit.source: They let you know if firmware upgrades are needed, if a network interface has issues, or if there is a problem with one of your data drives.
trans-unit.target: They let you know if firmware upgrades are needed, if a network interface has issues, or if there is a problem with one of your data drives.

trans-unit.source: **Connectivity issues** – These alerts occur when there is difficulty in transferring data between data sources.
trans-unit.target: **Connectivity issues** – These alerts occur when there is difficulty in transferring data between data sources.

trans-unit.source: Communication issues can occur during transfer of data to and from the Azure storage account or due to lack of connectivity between the devices and the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Communication issues can occur during transfer of data to and from the Azure storage account or due to lack of connectivity between the devices and the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: They can occur during configuration, backup, or restore processes.
trans-unit.target: They can occur during configuration, backup, or restore processes.

trans-unit.source: Communication issues are some of the hardest to fix because there are so many points of failure.
trans-unit.target: Communication issues are some of the hardest to fix because there are so many points of failure.

trans-unit.source: You should always first verify that network connectivity and Internet access are available before continuing on to more advanced troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: You should always first verify that network connectivity and Internet access are available before continuing on to more advanced troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: **Performance issues** – These alerts are caused when your system isn’t performing optimally, such as when it is under a heavy load.
trans-unit.target: **Performance issues** – These alerts are caused when your system isn’t performing optimally, such as when it is under a heavy load.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you might see alerts related to security, updates, or job failures.
trans-unit.target: In addition, you might see alerts related to security, updates, or job failures.

trans-unit.source: Alert severity levels
trans-unit.target: Alert severity levels

trans-unit.source: Alerts have different severity levels, depending on the impact that the alert situation will have and the need for a response to the alert.
trans-unit.target: Alerts have different severity levels, depending on the impact that the alert situation will have and the need for a response to the alert.

trans-unit.source: The severity levels are:
trans-unit.target: The severity levels are:

trans-unit.source: **Critical** – This alert is in response to a condition that is affecting the successful performance of your system.
trans-unit.target: **Critical** – This alert is in response to a condition that is affecting the successful performance of your system.

trans-unit.source: Action is required to ensure that the StorSimple service is not interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Action is required to ensure that the StorSimple service is not interrupted.

trans-unit.source: **Warning** – This condition could become critical if not resolved.
trans-unit.target: **Warning** – This condition could become critical if not resolved.

trans-unit.source: You should investigate the situation and take any action required to clear the issue.
trans-unit.target: You should investigate the situation and take any action required to clear the issue.

trans-unit.source: **Information** – This alert contains information that can be useful in tracking and managing your system.
trans-unit.target: **Information** – This alert contains information that can be useful in tracking and managing your system.

trans-unit.source: Configure alert settings
trans-unit.target: Configure alert settings

trans-unit.source: You can choose whether you want to be notified by email of alert conditions for each of your StorSimple devices.
trans-unit.target: You can choose whether you want to be notified by email of alert conditions for each of your StorSimple devices.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can identify other alert notification recipients by entering their email addresses in the **OTHER EMAIL RECIPIENTS** box, separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you can identify other alert notification recipients by entering their email addresses in the **OTHER EMAIL RECIPIENTS** box, separated by semicolons.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can enter a maximum of 20 email addresses per device.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can enter a maximum of 20 email addresses per device.

trans-unit.source: After you enable email notification for a device, members of the notification list will receive an email message each time a critical alert occurs.
trans-unit.target: After you enable email notification for a device, members of the notification list will receive an email message each time a critical alert occurs.

trans-unit.source: The messages will be sent from *storsimple-alerts-noreply@mail.windowsazure.com* and will describe the alert condition.
trans-unit.target: The messages will be sent from *storsimple-alerts-noreply@mail.windowsazure.com* and will describe the alert condition.

trans-unit.source: Recipients can click **Unsubscribe** to remove themselves from the email notification list.
trans-unit.target: Recipients can click **Unsubscribe** to remove themselves from the email notification list.

trans-unit.source: To enable email notification of alerts for a device
trans-unit.target: To enable email notification of alerts for a device

trans-unit.source: Go to **Devices** > **Configure** for the device.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Devices** > **Configure** for the device.

trans-unit.source: Under **Alert Settings**, set the following:
trans-unit.target: Under **Alert Settings**, set the following:

trans-unit.source: In the **SEND EMAIL NOTIFICATION** field, select **YES**.
trans-unit.target: In the **SEND EMAIL NOTIFICATION** field, select **YES**.

trans-unit.source: In the **EMAIL SERVICE ADMINISTRATORS** field, select **YES** if you wish to have the service administrator and all co-administrators receive the alert notifications.
trans-unit.target: In the **EMAIL SERVICE ADMINISTRATORS** field, select **YES** if you wish to have the service administrator and all co-administrators receive the alert notifications.

trans-unit.source: In the **OTHER EMAIL RECIPIENTS** field, enter the email addresses of all other recipients who should receive the alert notifications.
trans-unit.target: In the **OTHER EMAIL RECIPIENTS** field, enter the email addresses of all other recipients who should receive the alert notifications.

trans-unit.source: Enter names in the format *someone@somewhere.com*.
trans-unit.target: Enter names in the format *someone@somewhere.com*.

trans-unit.source: Use semicolons to separate the email addresses.
trans-unit.target: Use semicolons to separate the email addresses.

trans-unit.source: You can configure a maximum of 20 email addresses per device.
trans-unit.target: You can configure a maximum of 20 email addresses per device.

trans-unit.source: Alerts notification configuration page
trans-unit.target: Alerts notification configuration page

trans-unit.source: To send a test email notification, click the arrow icon next to **SEND TEST EMAIL**.
trans-unit.target: To send a test email notification, click the arrow icon next to **SEND TEST EMAIL**.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Manager service will display status messages as it forwards the test notification.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Manager service will display status messages as it forwards the test notification.

trans-unit.source: When the following message appears, click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: When the following message appears, click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Alerts test notification email sent
trans-unit.target: Alerts test notification email sent

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If the test notification message can't be sent, the StorSimple Manager service will display an appropriate message.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If the test notification message can't be sent, the StorSimple Manager service will display an appropriate message.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because of traffic or other network issues.
trans-unit.target: This can occur because of traffic or other network issues.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK**, wait a few minutes, and then try to send your test notification message again.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK**, wait a few minutes, and then try to send your test notification message again.

trans-unit.source: View and track alerts
trans-unit.target: View and track alerts

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Manager service dashboard provides you with a quick glance at the number of alerts on your devices, broken down by severity level.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Manager service dashboard provides you with a quick glance at the number of alerts on your devices, broken down by severity level.

trans-unit.source: Alerts dashboard
trans-unit.target: Alerts dashboard

trans-unit.source: Clicking the severity level opens the **Alerts** tab.
trans-unit.target: Clicking the severity level opens the **Alerts** tab.

trans-unit.source: The results include only the alerts that match that severity level.
trans-unit.target: The results include only the alerts that match that severity level.

trans-unit.source: Alerts report scoped to alert type
trans-unit.target: Alerts report scoped to alert type

trans-unit.source: Clicking an alert in the list provides you with additional details for the alert, including the last time the alert was reported, the number of occurrences of the alert on the device, and the recommended action to resolve the alert.
trans-unit.target: Clicking an alert in the list provides you with additional details for the alert, including the last time the alert was reported, the number of occurrences of the alert on the device, and the recommended action to resolve the alert.

trans-unit.source: If it is a hardware alert, it will also identify the hardware component.
trans-unit.target: If it is a hardware alert, it will also identify the hardware component.

trans-unit.source: Hardware alert example
trans-unit.target: Hardware alert example

trans-unit.source: You can copy the alert details to a text file if you want to track the alert resolution in a separate file or if you need to send the information to Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: You can copy the alert details to a text file if you want to track the alert resolution in a separate file or if you need to send the information to Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: After you have resolved the alert condition, you should clear the alert from the device by selecting the alert in the **Alerts** tab and clicking **Clear**.
trans-unit.target: After you have resolved the alert condition, you should clear the alert from the device by selecting the alert in the **Alerts** tab and clicking **Clear**.

trans-unit.source: To clear multiple alerts, press the Ctrl key while you select the alerts, and then click **Clear**.
trans-unit.target: To clear multiple alerts, press the Ctrl key while you select the alerts, and then click **Clear**.

trans-unit.source: Note that some alerts are automatically cleared when the issue is resolved or when the system updates the alert with new information.
trans-unit.target: Note that some alerts are automatically cleared when the issue is resolved or when the system updates the alert with new information.

trans-unit.source: When you click **Clear**, you will have the opportunity to provide comments about the alert and the steps that you took to resolve the issue.
trans-unit.target: When you click **Clear**, you will have the opportunity to provide comments about the alert and the steps that you took to resolve the issue.

trans-unit.source: Some events will be cleared by the system if another event is triggered with new information.
trans-unit.target: Some events will be cleared by the system if another event is triggered with new information.

trans-unit.source: In that case, you will see the following message.
trans-unit.target: In that case, you will see the following message.

trans-unit.source: Clear alert message
trans-unit.target: Clear alert message

trans-unit.source: Sort and review alerts
trans-unit.target: Sort and review alerts

trans-unit.source: You may find it more efficient to run reports on alerts so that you can review and clear them in groups.
trans-unit.target: You may find it more efficient to run reports on alerts so that you can review and clear them in groups.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the **Alerts** tab can display up to 250 alerts.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the **Alerts** tab can display up to 250 alerts.

trans-unit.source: If you have exceeded that number of alerts, not all alerts will be displayed in the default view.
trans-unit.target: If you have exceeded that number of alerts, not all alerts will be displayed in the default view.

trans-unit.source: You can combine the following fields to customize which alerts are displayed:
trans-unit.target: You can combine the following fields to customize which alerts are displayed:

trans-unit.source: **Status** – You can display either **Active** or **Cleared** alerts.
trans-unit.target: **Status** – You can display either **Active** or **Cleared** alerts.

trans-unit.source: Active alerts are still being triggered on your system, while cleared alerts have been either manually cleared by an administrator or programmatically cleared because the system updated the alert condition with new information.
trans-unit.target: Active alerts are still being triggered on your system, while cleared alerts have been either manually cleared by an administrator or programmatically cleared because the system updated the alert condition with new information.

trans-unit.source: **Severity** – You can display alerts of all severity levels (critical, warning, information), or just a certain severity, such as only critical alerts.
trans-unit.target: **Severity** – You can display alerts of all severity levels (critical, warning, information), or just a certain severity, such as only critical alerts.

trans-unit.source: **Source** – You can display alerts from all sources, or limit the alerts to those that come from either the service or one or all of the devices.
trans-unit.target: **Source** – You can display alerts from all sources, or limit the alerts to those that come from either the service or one or all of the devices.

trans-unit.source: **Time range** – By specifying the **From** and **To** dates and time stamps, you can look at alerts during the time period that you are interested in.
trans-unit.target: **Time range** – By specifying the **From** and **To** dates and time stamps, you can look at alerts during the time period that you are interested in.

trans-unit.source: Alerts quick reference
trans-unit.target: Alerts quick reference

trans-unit.source: The following tables list some of the Microsoft Azure StorSimple alerts that you might encounter, as well as additional information and recommendations where available.
trans-unit.target: The following tables list some of the Microsoft Azure StorSimple alerts that you might encounter, as well as additional information and recommendations where available.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple device alerts fall into one of the following categories:
trans-unit.target: StorSimple device alerts fall into one of the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Cloud connectivity alerts
trans-unit.target: Cloud connectivity alerts

trans-unit.source: Cluster alerts
trans-unit.target: Cluster alerts

trans-unit.source: Disaster recovery alerts
trans-unit.target: Disaster recovery alerts

trans-unit.source: Hardware alerts
trans-unit.target: Hardware alerts

trans-unit.source: Job failure alerts
trans-unit.target: Job failure alerts

trans-unit.source: Performance alerts
trans-unit.target: Performance alerts

trans-unit.source: Security alerts
trans-unit.target: Security alerts

trans-unit.source: Support package alerts
trans-unit.target: Support package alerts

trans-unit.source: Test alerts
trans-unit.target: Test alerts

trans-unit.source: Update alerts
trans-unit.target: Update alerts

trans-unit.source: Cloud connectivity alerts
trans-unit.target: Cloud connectivity alerts

trans-unit.source: Alert text
trans-unit.target: Alert text

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event

trans-unit.source: More information / recommended actions
trans-unit.target: More information / recommended actions

trans-unit.source: Connectivity to <*cloud credential name*> cannot be established.
trans-unit.target: Connectivity to <*cloud credential name*> cannot be established.

trans-unit.source: Cannot connect to the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Cannot connect to the storage account.

trans-unit.source: It looks like there might be a connectivity issue with your device.
trans-unit.target: It looks like there might be a connectivity issue with your device.

trans-unit.source: Please run the `Test-HcsmConnection` cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to identify and fix the issue.
trans-unit.target: Please run the `Test-HcsmConnection` cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to identify and fix the issue.

trans-unit.source: If the settings are correct, the issue might be with the credentials of the storage account for which the alert was raised.
trans-unit.target: If the settings are correct, the issue might be with the credentials of the storage account for which the alert was raised.

trans-unit.source: In this case, use the `Test-HcsStorageAccountCredential` cmdlet to determine if there are issues that you can resolve.
trans-unit.target: In this case, use the `Test-HcsStorageAccountCredential` cmdlet to determine if there are issues that you can resolve.

trans-unit.source: Check your network settings.
trans-unit.target: Check your network settings.

trans-unit.source: Check your storage account credentials.
trans-unit.target: Check your storage account credentials.

trans-unit.source: We have not received a heartbeat from your device for the last <*number*> minutes.
trans-unit.target: We have not received a heartbeat from your device for the last <*number*> minutes.

trans-unit.source: Cannot connect to device.
trans-unit.target: Cannot connect to device.

trans-unit.source: It looks like there is a connectivity issue with your device.
trans-unit.target: It looks like there is a connectivity issue with your device.

trans-unit.source: Please use the `Test-HcsmConnection` cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to identify and fix the issue or contact your network administrator.
trans-unit.target: Please use the `Test-HcsmConnection` cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to identify and fix the issue or contact your network administrator.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple behavior when cloud connectivity fails
trans-unit.target: StorSimple behavior when cloud connectivity fails

trans-unit.source: What happens if cloud connectivity fails for my StorSimple device running in production?
trans-unit.target: What happens if cloud connectivity fails for my StorSimple device running in production?

trans-unit.source: If cloud connectivity fails on your StorSimple production device, then depending on the state of your device, the following can occur:
trans-unit.target: If cloud connectivity fails on your StorSimple production device, then depending on the state of your device, the following can occur:

trans-unit.source: **For the local data on your device**: There will be no disruption and reads will continue to be served.
trans-unit.target: **For the local data on your device**: There will be no disruption and reads will continue to be served.

trans-unit.source: However, as the number of outstanding IOs increases and exceeds a limit, the reads could start to fail.
trans-unit.target: However, as the number of outstanding IOs increases and exceeds a limit, the reads could start to fail.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the amount of data on the local tiers of your device, the writes will also continue to occur for the first few hours after the disruption in the cloud connectivity.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the amount of data on the local tiers of your device, the writes will also continue to occur for the first few hours after the disruption in the cloud connectivity.

trans-unit.source: The writes will then slow down and eventually start to fail if the cloud connectivity is disrupted for several hours.
trans-unit.target: The writes will then slow down and eventually start to fail if the cloud connectivity is disrupted for several hours.

trans-unit.source: **For the data in the cloud**: For most cloud connectivity errors, an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: **For the data in the cloud**: For most cloud connectivity errors, an error is returned.

trans-unit.source: Once the connectivity is restored, the IOs are resumed without the user having to bring the volume online.
trans-unit.target: Once the connectivity is restored, the IOs are resumed without the user having to bring the volume online.

trans-unit.source: In rare instances, user intervention may be required to bring back the volume online from the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: In rare instances, user intervention may be required to bring back the volume online from the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: **For cloud snapshots in progress**: The operation is retried a few times within 4-5 hours and if the connectivity is not restored, the cloud snapshots will fail.
trans-unit.target: **For cloud snapshots in progress**: The operation is retried a few times within 4-5 hours and if the connectivity is not restored, the cloud snapshots will fail.

trans-unit.target: Device failed over to <*device name*>.

trans-unit.target: Verify that this was a planned failover.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: Device failed over to <*device name*>.
trans-unit.target: Device failed over to <*device name*>.

trans-unit.target: Unplanned failover.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple is built to automatically recover from unplanned failovers.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple is built to automatically recover from unplanned failovers.

trans-unit.source: If you see a large number of these alerts, please contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: If you see a large number of these alerts, please contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.target: Device failed over to <*device name*>.

trans-unit.source: Disaster recovery alerts
trans-unit.target: Disaster recovery alerts

trans-unit.source: Alert text
trans-unit.target: Alert text

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event

trans-unit.source: More information / recommended actions
trans-unit.target: More information / recommended actions

trans-unit.source: Recovery operations could not restore all of the settings for this service.
trans-unit.target: Recovery operations could not restore all of the settings for this service.

trans-unit.source: Device configuration data is in an inconsistent state for some devices.
trans-unit.target: Device configuration data is in an inconsistent state for some devices.

trans-unit.source: Data inconsistency detected after disaster recovery.
trans-unit.target: Data inconsistency detected after disaster recovery.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted data on the service is not synchronized with that on the device.
trans-unit.target: Encrypted data on the service is not synchronized with that on the device.

trans-unit.source: Authorize the device <*device name*> from StorSimple Manager to start the synchronization process.
trans-unit.target: Authorize the device <*device name*> from StorSimple Manager to start the synchronization process.

trans-unit.source: Use the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple to run the `Restore-HcsmEncryptedServiceData` on device <*device name*> cmdlet, providing the old password as an input to this cmdlet to restore the security profile.
trans-unit.target: Use the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple to run the `Restore-HcsmEncryptedServiceData` on device <*device name*> cmdlet, providing the old password as an input to this cmdlet to restore the security profile.

trans-unit.source: Then run the `Invoke-HcsmServiceDataEncryptionKeyChange` cmdlet to update the service data encryption key.
trans-unit.target: Then run the `Invoke-HcsmServiceDataEncryptionKeyChange` cmdlet to update the service data encryption key.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: The service has failed over to a secondary data center due to an unexpected failure.
trans-unit.target: The service has failed over to a secondary data center due to an unexpected failure.

trans-unit.source: Other/unknown cause.
trans-unit.target: Other/unknown cause.

trans-unit.source: You need to verify your configuration settings in StorSimple Manager to continue.
trans-unit.target: You need to verify your configuration settings in StorSimple Manager to continue.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: For more information about StorSimple Manager see the [Use StorSimple Manager service to administer your StorSimple device](storsimple-manager-service-administration.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about StorSimple Manager see the [Use StorSimple Manager service to administer your StorSimple device](storsimple-manager-service-administration.md).

trans-unit.source: Hardware component <*component ID*> reports status as <*status*>.
trans-unit.target: Hardware component <*component ID*> reports status as <*status*>.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes temporary conditions can cause these alerts.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes temporary conditions can cause these alerts.

trans-unit.source: If so, this alert will be automatically cleared after some time.
trans-unit.target: If so, this alert will be automatically cleared after some time.

trans-unit.source: If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: Passive controller malfunctioning.
trans-unit.target: Passive controller malfunctioning.

trans-unit.source: The passive (secondary) controller is not functioning.
trans-unit.target: The passive (secondary) controller is not functioning.

trans-unit.source: Your device is operational, but one of your controllers is malfunctioning.
trans-unit.target: Your device is operational, but one of your controllers is malfunctioning.

trans-unit.source: Try restarting that controller.
trans-unit.target: Try restarting that controller.

trans-unit.source: If the issue is not resolved, contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: If the issue is not resolved, contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: Job failure alerts
trans-unit.target: Job failure alerts

trans-unit.source: Alert text
trans-unit.target: Alert text

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event

trans-unit.source: More information / recommended actions
trans-unit.target: More information / recommended actions

trans-unit.source: Backup of <*source volume group ID*> failed.
trans-unit.target: Backup of <*source volume group ID*> failed.

trans-unit.source: Backup job failed.
trans-unit.target: Backup job failed.

trans-unit.source: Connectivity issues could be preventing the backup operation from successfully completing.
trans-unit.target: Connectivity issues could be preventing the backup operation from successfully completing.

trans-unit.source: If there are no connectivity issues, you may have reached the maximum number of backups.
trans-unit.target: If there are no connectivity issues, you may have reached the maximum number of backups.

trans-unit.source: Delete any backups that are no longer needed and retry the operation.
trans-unit.target: Delete any backups that are no longer needed and retry the operation.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: Clone of <*source backup element IDs*> to <*destination volume serial numbers*> failed.
trans-unit.target: Clone of <*source backup element IDs*> to <*destination volume serial numbers*> failed.

trans-unit.source: Clone job failed.
trans-unit.target: Clone job failed.

trans-unit.source: Refresh the backup list to verify that the backup is still valid.
trans-unit.target: Refresh the backup list to verify that the backup is still valid.

trans-unit.source: If the backup is valid, it is possible that cloud connectivity issues are preventing the clone operation from successfully completing.
trans-unit.target: If the backup is valid, it is possible that cloud connectivity issues are preventing the clone operation from successfully completing.

trans-unit.source: If there are no connectivity issues, you may have reached the storage limit.
trans-unit.target: If there are no connectivity issues, you may have reached the storage limit.

trans-unit.source: Delete any backups that are no longer needed and retry the operation.
trans-unit.target: Delete any backups that are no longer needed and retry the operation.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action to resolve the issue, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action to resolve the issue, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: Restore of <*source backup element IDs*> failed.
trans-unit.target: Restore of <*source backup element IDs*> failed.

trans-unit.source: Restore job failed.
trans-unit.target: Restore job failed.

trans-unit.source: Refresh the backup list to verify that the backup is still valid.
trans-unit.target: Refresh the backup list to verify that the backup is still valid.

trans-unit.source: If the backup is valid, it is possible that cloud connectivity issues are preventing the restore operation from successfully completing.
trans-unit.target: If the backup is valid, it is possible that cloud connectivity issues are preventing the restore operation from successfully completing.

trans-unit.source: If there are no connectivity issues, you may have reached the storage limit.
trans-unit.target: If there are no connectivity issues, you may have reached the storage limit.

trans-unit.source: Delete any backups that are no longer needed and retry the operation.
trans-unit.target: Delete any backups that are no longer needed and retry the operation.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action to resolve the issue, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action to resolve the issue, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: Performance alerts
trans-unit.target: Performance alerts

trans-unit.source: Alert text
trans-unit.target: Alert text

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event

trans-unit.source: More information / recommended actions
trans-unit.target: More information / recommended actions

trans-unit.source: The device load has exceeded <*threshold*>.
trans-unit.target: The device load has exceeded <*threshold*>.

trans-unit.source: Slower than expected response times.
trans-unit.target: Slower than expected response times.

trans-unit.source: Your device reports utilization under a heavy input/output load.
trans-unit.target: Your device reports utilization under a heavy input/output load.

trans-unit.source: This could cause your device to not work as well as it should.
trans-unit.target: This could cause your device to not work as well as it should.

trans-unit.source: Please review the workloads that you have attached to the device and determine if there are any that could be moved to another device or that are no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: Please review the workloads that you have attached to the device and determine if there are any that could be moved to another device or that are no longer necessary.

trans-unit.source: Security alerts
trans-unit.target: Security alerts

trans-unit.source: Alert text
trans-unit.target: Alert text

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event

trans-unit.source: More information / recommended actions
trans-unit.target: More information / recommended actions

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Support session has begun.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Support session has begun.

trans-unit.source: Third-party accessed support session.
trans-unit.target: Third-party accessed support session.

trans-unit.source: Please confirm this access is authorized.
trans-unit.target: Please confirm this access is authorized.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: Password for <*element*> will expire in <*length of time*>.
trans-unit.target: Password for <*element*> will expire in <*length of time*>.

trans-unit.source: Change your password before it expires.
trans-unit.target: Change your password before it expires.

trans-unit.source: Security configuration information missing for <*element ID*>.
trans-unit.target: Security configuration information missing for <*element ID*>.

trans-unit.source: The volumes associated with this volume container cannot be used to replicate your StorSimple configuration.
trans-unit.target: The volumes associated with this volume container cannot be used to replicate your StorSimple configuration.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your data is safely stored, we recommend that you delete the volume container and any volumes associated with the volume container.
trans-unit.target: To ensure that your data is safely stored, we recommend that you delete the volume container and any volumes associated with the volume container.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: <*number*> login attempts failed for <*element ID*>.
trans-unit.target: <*number*> login attempts failed for <*element ID*>.

trans-unit.source: Multiple failed logon attempts.
trans-unit.target: Multiple failed logon attempts.

trans-unit.source: Your device might be under attack or an authorized user is attempting to connect with an incorrect password.
trans-unit.target: Your device might be under attack or an authorized user is attempting to connect with an incorrect password.

trans-unit.source: Contact your authorized users and verify that these attempts were from a legitimate source.
trans-unit.target: Contact your authorized users and verify that these attempts were from a legitimate source.

trans-unit.source: If you continue to see large numbers of failed login attempts, consider disabling remote management and contacting your network administrator.
trans-unit.target: If you continue to see large numbers of failed login attempts, consider disabling remote management and contacting your network administrator.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: Check that your Snapshot Manager instances are configured with the correct password.
trans-unit.target: Check that your Snapshot Manager instances are configured with the correct password.

trans-unit.source: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you have taken appropriate action, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.source: One or more failures occurred while changing the service data encryption key.
trans-unit.target: One or more failures occurred while changing the service data encryption key.

trans-unit.source: There were errors encountered while changing the service data encryption key.
trans-unit.target: There were errors encountered while changing the service data encryption key.

trans-unit.source: After you have addressed the error conditions, run the `Invoke-HcsmServiceDataEncryptionKeyChange` cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to update the service.
trans-unit.target: After you have addressed the error conditions, run the `Invoke-HcsmServiceDataEncryptionKeyChange` cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to update the service.

trans-unit.source: If this issue persists, please contact Microsoft support.
trans-unit.target: If this issue persists, please contact Microsoft support.

trans-unit.source: After you resolve the issue, please clear this alert from the alerts page.
trans-unit.target: After you resolve the issue, please clear this alert from the alerts page.

trans-unit.target: Alert text

trans-unit.source: More information / recommended actions
trans-unit.target: More information / recommended actions

trans-unit.source: Hotfix installed.
trans-unit.target: Hotfix installed.

trans-unit.source: Software/firmware update completed.
trans-unit.target: Software/firmware update completed.

trans-unit.source: The hotfix has been successfully installed on your device.
trans-unit.target: The hotfix has been successfully installed on your device.

trans-unit.source: Manual updates available.
trans-unit.target: Manual updates available.

trans-unit.source: Notification of available updates.
trans-unit.target: Notification of available updates.

trans-unit.source: Please use the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to install these updates.
trans-unit.target: Please use the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device to install these updates.

trans-unit.source: New updates available.
trans-unit.target: New updates available.

trans-unit.source: Notification of available updates.
trans-unit.target: Notification of available updates.

trans-unit.source: You can install these updates either from the **Maintenance** page or by using the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device.
trans-unit.target: You can install these updates either from the **Maintenance** page or by using the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device.

trans-unit.source: Failed to install updates.
trans-unit.target: Failed to install updates.

trans-unit.source: Updates were not successfully installed.
trans-unit.target: Updates were not successfully installed.

trans-unit.source: Your system was not able to install the updates.
trans-unit.target: Your system was not able to install the updates.

trans-unit.source: You can install these updates either from the **Maintenance** page or by using the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device.
trans-unit.target: You can install these updates either from the **Maintenance** page or by using the Windows PowerShell Interface for StorSimple on your device.

trans-unit.source: If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: Unable to automatically check for new updates.
trans-unit.target: Unable to automatically check for new updates.

trans-unit.source: Automatic check failed.
trans-unit.target: Automatic check failed.

trans-unit.source: You can manually check for new updates from the **Maintenance** page.
trans-unit.target: You can manually check for new updates from the **Maintenance** page.

trans-unit.source: New WUA agent available.
trans-unit.target: New WUA agent available.

trans-unit.source: Notification of available update.
trans-unit.target: Notification of available update.

trans-unit.source: Download the latest Windows Update Agent and install it from the Windows PowerShell interface.
trans-unit.target: Download the latest Windows Update Agent and install it from the Windows PowerShell interface.

trans-unit.source: Version of firmware component <*component ID*> does not match with hardware.
trans-unit.target: Version of firmware component <*component ID*> does not match with hardware.

trans-unit.target: Firmware update(s) were not successfully installed.

trans-unit.target: Please contact Microsoft Support.
